'''Paimon's Bargains''' is a shop that offers [[Wishing Items]], [[Materials]], and a rotating selection of [[Character]]s and [[Weapon]]s in exchange for [[Masterless Starglitter]], [[Masterless Stardust]], or [[Primogem]]s.

==Starglitter Exchange==
[[File:Item Masterless Starglitter.png|right|75px|thumb|Starglitter|link=Masterless Starglitter]]
All items are exchanged for [[Masterless Starglitter]]. The shop offers 2 different characters, 5 weapons (one of each type), [[Character Ascension Material]]s, and top-rarity [[Character and Weapon Enhancement Material]]s every month.
